snippet: Osvaldo Rivera is accused of breaking into a Camden bedroom and slitting the children’s throats, killing a 6-year-old boy and wounding his sister.
lead_paragraph: Osvaldo Rivera is accused of breaking into a Camden bedroom and slitting the children’s throats, killing a 6-year-old boy and wounding his sister.

headline.seo: Man Arrested in Grisly Attack on Siblings in New Jersey
headline.main: Man Arrested in Grisly Attack on 2 Siblings in New Jersey
